description: Navigate a website step-by-step with visual feedback - demonstrates interactive browsing with loop_until validation

inputs_schema.goal: What to accomplish on the website (e.g., 'find the pricing page and tell me the cost')

cells.name: start_session
cells.instructions: Start a browser session at {{ input.url }} and describe what you see in the initial screenshot.

cells.name: navigate
cells.instructions:
Your goal: {{ input.goal }}

You can see the current page in the screenshot. Take actions to accomplish your goal.

CRITICAL: To click, you MUST move mouse first, then click!

Available actions:
- rabbitize_execute('[":move-mouse", ":to", x, y]') - Move cursor to position (REQUIRED before click!)
- rabbitize_execute('[":click"]') - Click at current cursor position (NO ARGS!)
- rabbitize_execute('[":type", "text here"]') - Type text  
- rabbitize_execute('[":scroll-wheel-down", 5]') - Scroll down
- rabbitize_execute('[":keypress", "Enter"]') - Press key
- rabbitize_extract() - Get page content and coordinates

Take ONE action at a time. After each action, you'll see the result screenshot.

When you've accomplished the goal, use route_to to go to complete_goal.

rules.loop_until_prompt:
Continue navigating until you have accomplished: {{ input.goal }}
Then use route_to to complete_goal.
rules.retry_instructions: The goal was not accomplished yet. Keep navigating to achieve: {{ input.goal }}

cells.name: complete_goal
cells.instructions: Close the browser session and summarize what you accomplished.
